derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (originally in the sense 'love, affection'): via Old French from Latin amor 'love'. The current sense dates from the late 16th cent

entry.def: An amour is a love affair, especially one which is kept secret.

means.word_mean: 1. a usually secretive or illicit sexual relationship

stems_affixes.word_buile: ami=am爱,情爱+able能……的→能[被]爱的→亲切的
am爱,情爱+ic+able能……的→能爱[你]的→友好的
am爱,情爱+ity表名词,状态,性质→爱的状态→和睦
am爱,情爱+our表名词→n.奸情, 恋情
en进入+am爱,情爱+ity表名词→enmity爱太多的成为恨
